metadata.name: Sandra Hernandez

persona.name: Kevin O'Brien
persona.role: Prospective customer, real estate broker (home office; uncertain if business-eligible)
persona.goal: Figure out whether to use residential portal or business service and get pointed to the right place
persona.context: Works from home, needs reliable internet for video tours; unsure whether to buy business-class or residential; starts with a vague inquiry
persona.tone: Casual, exploratory, not sure what to ask

intent.name: Change of Address / Move Service
intent.description: An existing customer needs to move service to a new business location; should be qualified and scheduled for a callback.
intent.goal: Capture new address and timeline and schedule a callback to coordinate the move.
intent.initialMessage: We’re moving offices next month—how do I transfer our service to the new address?

emotion.name: Matter-of-fact
emotion.description: States the issue plainly, provides specifics (invoice date, outage time), expects direct routing and minimal back-and-forth.

metadata.outcome: Agreed to schedule a callback with a Business Class agent to discuss business vs residential options.

turns.content: We’re moving offices next month—how do I transfer our service to the new address?
I understand you’re moving offices next month and want to transfer your service. What date, time, and time zone work best for a move appointment?

messages: I understand you’re moving offices next month and want to transfer your service. What date, time, and time zone work best for a move appointment?

turns.content: I’m still trying to figure out if I should even be on a business account. It’s just me working from my home office as a real estate broker—should I be using your business move service, or is this something that should go through your residential side instead?
I hear you’re unsure whether a business or residential plan fits your home office. Our Business Class agent can review your needs and advise. Would you like me to schedule a call?

messages: I hear you’re unsure whether a business or residential plan fits your home office. Our Business Class agent can review your needs and advise. Would you like me to schedule a call?

turns.content:
Yeah, a call would be helpful.  

Can you do sometime tomorrow afternoon, Eastern time? I’m flexible between 1–4 pm, and they can reach me at 713-796-2081.
